body.name: Maylibet 10 Channels Expandable Solar Security Cameras Wireless System Outdoor, 4PCS 2K Home PTZ Surveillance Camera with 10" Monitor, 2-Way Audio, Color Night Vision, 2.4G WiFi, IP66, 128G Storage
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 58 mins
features: 【100% Wire-Free and Solar Powered】Our solar powered outdoor camera eliminates the need for wires and cables, making it easy to install and use. With high-capacity battery, long-lasting power per charge ensures that the cameras keep working even in inclement weather or at night.

【2K High-Definition Live Video with Color Night Vision】Maylibet wireless security camera offers 2K full HD resolution for superior day and night vision. Advanced color night vision technology allows you to enjoy vivid and accurate colors even in low-light conditions. (To view color vision at night, the spotlight feature must be manually activated)

【360° View for All-Around Protection & IP66 Weatherproof】This PTZ outdoor security camera has a 355° horizontal and 90° vertical rotation range, allowing it to capture wider areas and record crystal-clear videos. It’s IP66 waterproof, which can be used safely in regardless of rain, sunlight, or other weather conditions and is able to work in -10°~55°.

【10 Channels Expandable & All-in-one with 10 inches Monitor】Maylibet wireless security camera system integrated with 10CH 4MP NVR, 10" full HD Monitor and 128GB TF card, meets all your video surveillance demands. It is easy to DIY install and setup. You can order 6 more add-on cameras to expand up to 10-camera system.

【Truly Risk-free Purchase】Videos can be securely stored locally on an 128GB TF card (included). Which you can access and playback anytime and anywhere via APP. 1-Year Warranty ensures this will quickly become your favorite no-risk purchase. With reliable and stable 2.4Ghz WiFi connection (5G is not supported), you can listen and talk interactively with your beloved ones, ward off would-be burglars when off-site.

productInformation.value: 3.7 3.7 out of 5 stars 7 ratings 3.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2K Solar Powered Wireless Cameras System, get an all-round view of your home, day or night!

355° Pan & 90° tilt Get More Areas Covered Remotely control the camera via App to get an overview of your property. Expandable system Order 6 more add-on solar cameras to expand up to 10-camera system. Solar panel with 3 meters cord, so the security camera and solar panel can be installed separately, you can find the best place to install the panel to get sufficient sunlight.

Color night vision Open the spotlight feature via Eseecloud APP, you can see everything clearly even in the darkness. Siren alarm Set siren and spotlight alarm to warn off invaders via APP. Record only when moving objects detected, not only can save storage but also can search important event quickly.

IP66 Waterproof Made of excellent waterproof material, don't need to worry about rain and snow. With loved ones, it's safer Remote real-time view, share the camera with family who are traveling or business trips easily. What's in the box 1 * WiFi Security Network Video Recorder with monitor & 128GB mircro SD card 4 * Wire-Free Security Camera with Solar Panel 1* User Guide 1* USB Mouse 2* USB to USB-C charging cable 4* mounting screw kit

Please notice: 1, 128G Micro SD Card Storage was installed in the video recorder, no monthly fee. It also supports cloud storage. 2, It only works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi networks, does not support 5GHz Wi-Fi. 3, Please charge every solar camera by the USB to USB-C charging cable (including) for 5 hours before first use. 4, If you want to add cameras to expand the system to more channels, please search B0CHLZM259 on Amazon's APP to find our standalone solar camera to order directly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The electrical installation of this solar outdoor surveillance camera is simple and convenient!
reviews.reviewText: This outdoor security camera with solar panels is made of high-quality waterproof materials. It can pan 365 degrees and tilt 90 degrees regardless of day or night vision. It can be remotely controlled through the App and can also set alarms and spotlight alarms to warn intruders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent wireless security camera system with monitor
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After looking at several Security Camera Systems I decided to go with this 4 Camera System. Installation and setup went very smoothly, I did it all by myself. Slolar power and WiFi connection so no wiring required. The cameras work great, and the picture/sound quality is amazing（clear images even at night and it really detects humans）It alerts our phones and tablets via the app, when there is movement around the house 24/7.I wish the screen was a touch screen, but the included mouse works fine. Having the ability to plug in a separate HDMI monitor that is much bigger is great as well.The system work perfect so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Customer service has been Amazing and the camera system is doing great .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Robust monitoring system
reviews.reviewText: Setup: a little bit tricky as you need a monitor. There are two versions of this product. I got the cheaper one which doesn't have a built-in monitor. At least, I didn't figure out how to connect to the app without a monitor. You need a monitor and hdmi cable then use the mouth (included) to set it up. The entire setup is very straightforward with a monitor.Night vision/motion detection: it's acceptable. For example, can capture two mice chasing around at night in my job site.Biggest plus: I can use the app to move the cams so it provides much larger coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just successfully set up this wireless solar security camera and just downloaded the App to use this solar security camera. The quality of the video, very high-definition detail. You can also download a App through dialogue and then install it. It is very simple and easy. As long as you have Wi-Fi, it will be no problem. I also tried to use my mobile phone to remotely control this security camera. I haven't installed it in my backyard yet. because the weather here is relatively cold. I will install it when the weather warms up. This one is really useful. I highly recommend it to friends who need it. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setting up this camera was relatively easy for us and it comes with an app called EasyCloud. I find it updates very quickly and the camera/picture quality is very good, in my opinion the camera is better than that one. I love the wide view as it can see the front of my house as well as the street/neighbors across the street/etc. If you need a high quality camera at a more affordable price, I recommend this one. I also like that it is solar powered so no images of it mounted on the house but it works great
